Reviews.Content: 4night stay hotel advertised 4 antique treasure refurbished poor offered grubby barely worthy 2 carpets chairs stained worn ago bath surface missing offered modern half hotel 3 value bathroom flooded shower disappointment position 500m colosseum continental breakfast outdoor roof terrace wind protection february reasonable special location south road north shown google maps

Reviews.Title: “Lapo & Fabio made up for the inconveniences!”
Reviews.Author: sunshinebaptiste
Reviews.Content: youre looking run mill ac wasnt fabio upgraded suites updated hotel boy huge difference nice modern vs traditional night wing revamp wonder owner nevertheless wonderful experience front desk receptionists fabio oustanding beyond call duty ensure stay pleasant honestly truly believe run joint rude colleague fell short stepped solo traveler personal concierge beckon call care transport local eateries getting personal requests name fellas special care special thank stay rome especially pleasant ill remember

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel, With Good Service That Should Improve In Time”

Reviews.Content: overall stay pleasant inconveniences probably graded price fourstar rating hotel midst expanding bought building door knocked wail connect hall completely experiences below based pros location close forum palatine ruins capitoline museums walk touristy campo di fiori vatican furthest walk 20 minutes 1015 metro brand modern ultra clean fresh service miscommunication arrived staff willing whatever ensure stay happy helpful cons building ultra designed shower flooded bathroom move based design setup layout window location etc rough edges missing ceiling panel bedroom mirror refrig missing etc expect corrected time design wont minor detraction breakfast adequate nice location roof fourstar hotel expect variety croissants stayed hotels month italy including star stars breakfast low list parking none cab driving returning car difficult narrow driveway restaurants happened otherwise park busy street parking allowed actually typical rome except led believe location fine parking unloading minor issue aware arriving
